title: Understanding Column Insertion
text: To insert a column, you need to access the column options. Think about where you can find these options.

title: Accessing the Shortcut Menu
text: The shortcut menu can be accessed by right-clicking on the column headings. This menu provides various options, including inserting a column.

hintAnswer: $$Right-click$$ the column headings, click insert on the shortcut menu
title: Inserting a Column
text: Once you have accessed the shortcut menu by right-clicking the column headings, what option should you select to insert a column?
choices: $$Right-click$$ the column headings, click insert on the shortcut menu
click the column, then press insert
click any cell in the column, then click insert
